short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop your favorite stores & donate to the cause you care about. It's easy and FREE!
short.es,he,it,pt_BR,pt_PT,sv: Shop your favorite brands & donate to the cause you care about. It's easy and FREE!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss an opportunity to donate and support your favorite charity or good cause again with the Smile Markets Donation Extension.

Get free donations for your favorite cause in just 1-click!

Shop. Donate. Smile.

Add the Smile Markets Donation Extension to your browser and we’ll find donations for your good cause. Just shop online normally, and we'll let you know when you can shop and get a donation for shopping at the store you are viewing. It’s free & easy, the best way to support your favorite cause!
__________________________________________________________________________

When you buy through links on Smile Markets we may earn a commission.
Privacy Policy: https://smile.markets/privacy-policy
Questions? Contact Us: https://smile.markets/contact
For information on the permissions the Smile Markets Donation Extension uses, see: https://smile.markets/ext-permissions
